alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Essex and east central Middlesex Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middleton, or near Danvers, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lynn, Peabody, Salem, Beverly, Andover, Gloucester, North Andover, Saugus, Danvers, Wakefield, Reading, Stoneham, North Reading, Ipswich, Lynnfield, Middleton, Georgetown, Boxford, Hamilton, and Rockport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex
